question: My son wishes to be Haafiz inshallah. Iâ€˜m pleased with his intention but concerned later in life, his Quran may be forgotten due to economic pressure, getting married, etc. I have seen many examples.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Alhamdulillah, your son has a noble intention to put the Quraan in his heart. Concerns are many as pressures could be many. But we do not know the future, it is only Allah who is the Knower of everything. How many parents have children with such noble intentions.

Also remember that a Dua of a parent for a child is so very important, instead of worrying about the future make Dua for the present and the future that Allah makes a Haafiz and keeps the Quraan in his heart and makes him make Amaal upon it. Remember if proper love for the Quraan is cultivated into the child at a young age he would never leave the Quraan under any circumstance.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Shaykh Irshaad Amod / Moulana Imraan Vawda
FATWA DEPT.
